author: Anjana George
title: alamaara: Alamaara's trailer will be released tomorrow in theatres during Veeram's screening
text:
For all those who are eagerly waiting for the release of Midhun Manuel Thomas ' next Alamaara has a reason to rejoice. The film's trailer will be released tomorrow during the screening of Veeram in the theatres.
Expected to release on March 17, the film has Sunny Wayn , Adithi Ravi and Renji Panicker playing pivotal roles. The film is written by John Manthrickal and is a satire. "There's a custom of gifting a cupboard (alamara) to a newly married bride along with the dowry. Alamara talks about a young couple and their comical experiences after a cupboard enters their lives," says Midhun on the film.
